name: Finger Smash
description:
Need a fast and fun game for your fingers?
Get them smashing NOW.
The more you smash, the higher the score.
Smash your way through fruit, robots, sushi and more in each round to score.
How fast can your fingers smash?

FEATURES
* Super-fast and addictive
* Retro arcade-style graphics
* One-touch gameplay
* Smooth and rewarding time-passer
* Over 20 sprite themes to unlock and play - from Ancient Egypt and Aztecs to race cars and candy.
